meanings.definition: The quality or state of being naff or uncool.
meanings.sent1: The naffnesses of his outfit made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the naffnesses of the old decorations.
meanings.sent3: The party had a touch of naffnesses with the cheesy music playing.
meanings.sent4: The naffnesses of the situation was like a neon sign flashing 'uncool'.
meanings.sent5: The naffnesses of the clown's costume was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Instances of something being naff or uncool.
meanings.sent1: The store was filled with various naffnesses that no one wanted to buy.
meanings.sent2: He collected all the naffnesses he found at thrift stores.
meanings.sent3: The room was a museum of naffnesses, each item more uncool than the last.
meanings.sent4: The naffnesses in the room hung heavy like a cloud of embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The garage sale was a treasure trove of naffnesses.
